trait.name: Aura of Authority
entries: While in a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the hobgoblin, the hobgoblin and its allies have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the hobgoblin doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two attacks, using Greatsword or Longbow in any combination.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) Slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 4}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) Piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) Poison damage.
